channel.title: References on Nitro CI
channel.description: Recent content in References on Nitro CI

item.title: Configuration
item.description: There are several configurations that can be applied to override default behaviours and values of the command-line interface. In the event of a conflict then the environment variable configuration ovverrides the Global Config. Global Config Environment variables Global Config TOML [nitroci] # Path where plugins are stored pluginPath = "$HOME/.nitro/plugins" YAML ---nitroci:# Path where plugins are storedpluginPath:"$HOME/.
